About

I am an Associate Professor in the School of Biological Sciences at the University of Utah in Salt Lake City, Utah, USA. Here is my faculty profile page.

The Brazelton Lab currently features:

  • Julia McGonigle, NASA Astrobiology postdoctoral fellow
  • Ceclia Prator, NSF postdoctoral fellow
  • Alli Hoffman, undergraduate researcher
  • Briggs Miller, undergraduate researcher
  • Jake Lowe, undergraduate researcher

Brazelton Lab alumni include:

  • Madison Block
  • Cody Dangerfield
  • Emily Dart
  • Sarah Hludzinski
  • Alex Hyer
  • LeAundra Schopflin
  • Sheri Motamedi
  • Lizethe Pendleton
  • Mac Pierce
  • Abbey Rees
  • Christopher Thornton
  • Katrina Twing
  • Mikayla Wheeler
